name: TWIST3D
summary:
ARE YOU TWISTED? Discover a brand new addictive match-making puzzle game - get TWIST3D with an exciting match-3-in-3D experience.

Twist and spin the cube, find and destroy matches, solving puzzles and collect magical Gems! Discover lots of fresh challenges as you climb the leaderboards! 

OH MY! Tap to destroy rows of colors

WHOOSH! Spin the 3D cube to spot new combos

OOO SHINY! Match combo colors with Gems to solve puzzles

Sounds easy enough, right?

GAME FEATURES:

- Addictive and unique match-making experience
- Enjoy the gorgeous and minimalistic art style
- Unlock powerful boosters and mystery prizes
- Challenge your Facebook friends to beat your best score!

Follow us on Facebook and Twitter!
